page.title: 03Patterns of Worship.
page.content: In our block there are five places where religious services are held. There are three Church of England churches and two Methodist chapels. The rector of Lockington is in charge of the churches at Lockington and Lund.There is one service each Sunday at Lockington either in the morning or the evening and also at Lund.There is a Sunday School at Lund for the children.In Lockington there is a service every Sunday evening in the chapel and in Lund the chapel services are also every Sunday.People who are Roman Catholics have to go to the church in Beverley or Market Weighton about 6 miles away.
